Appearance.bulletReplace: Replace triangular bullets with normal ones
Appearance.unspoil: Add a link to show all spoilers in a post
Appearance.stickyVoteButtons: Make vote buttons next to posts sticky whilst scrolling on that post
Appearance.betterCSS: Add extra CSS for voting signs and favourite button (currently only on Android SE)
Appearance.standOutDupeCloseMigrated: Add colourful, more apparent signs to questions that are on hold, duplicates, closed or migrated on question lists
Appearance.metaNewQuestionAlert: Add an extra mod diamond to the topbar that alerts you if there is a new question posted on the child-meta of the current site
Appearance.hideHotNetworkQuestions: Hide the Hot Network Questions module
Appearance.hideHireMe: Hide the Looking for a Job module
Appearance.hideSearchBar: Replaces the searchbar with an link to the search page

Flags.flagOutcomeTime: Show the flag outcome time when viewing your Flag History
Flags.flagPercentages: Show flagging percentages for each type in the Flag Summary

Comments.kbdAndBullets: Add KBD and list buttons to editor toolbar
Comments.editReasonTooltip: Add a tooltip to posts showing the latest revision's comment on 'edited [date] at [time]'
Comments.addSBSBtn: Add a button to the editor toolbar to start side-by-side editing
Comments.linkQuestionAuthorName: Add a button in the editor toolbar to insert a hyperlink to a post and add the author automatically
Comments.titleEditDiff: Make title edits show seperately rather than merged

Unsorted.confirmNavigateAway: Add a confirmation dialog before navigating away on pages whilst you are still typing a comment
Unsorted.sortByBountyAmount: Add an option to filter bounties by their amount
Unsorted.isQuestionHot: Add a label on questions which are hot-network questions
Unsorted.answerTagsSearch: Show tags for the question an answer belongs to on search pages (for better context)
Unsorted.metaChatBlogStackExchangeButton: Show meta, chat and blog buttons on hover of a site under the StackExchange button
Unsorted.alwaysShowImageUploadLinkBox: Always show the 'Link from the web' box when uploading an image
Unsorted.addAuthorNameToInboxNotifications: Add the author's name to notifications in the inbox
Unsorted.linkedPostsInline: Display linked posts inline (with an arrow)
